CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1957, pg. A7 reads: "B'nai B'rith Art Contest Winners - For the 11th consecutive year, the B'nai B'rith Womens' Council of Greater Pittsburgh sponsored an art contest in Pittsburgh public schools, in cooperation with the Pittsburgh Board of Public Education. The following winners display their winning entries for Junior Courier readers...Lower photo: Miss Mary McKibbon of the Board of Education; Robert Jones, Fifth Ave. High, senior division, first award, and Carole Lee Phillips, Troy Hill, junior division, second award.- Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mary McKibbon from the Board of Education, posing with art contest winners including Robert Jones, possibly Mel Bonchner in center, and Carole Lee Phillips in interior, possibly Board of Education building
